FuncDef: This command creates an AARP interface for connecting a service to a peer node AARP service. This instance is paired with the same AARP interface in a peer node as part of a configuration to provide flow and packet asymmetry removal for traffic for a multi-homed SAP or spoke SDP.

ParaDef.Info: A string of up to 32 characters identifying the interface.
Keyword used to create the AARP interface.
